mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(mb.mansearch_sno) totSize FROM board b LEFT JOIN mansearch_board mb on b.sno = mb.sno LEFT JOIN corperation c on b.id = c.id WHERE b.boardtype='mansearch' and b.subject LIKE '%${findStr}%' or mb.position LIKE '%${findStr}%' or mb.main_task LIKE '%${findStr}%' or mb.required_skill LIKE '%${findStr}%' or c.corp_name LIKE '%${findStr}%'

SELECT DATEDIFF(deadline, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) as deadlinecount, mb.mansearch_sno, mb.pay, mb.corp_location, mb.position, mb.required_career, mb.job_type, mb.required_skill, mb.deadline, mb.main_task, mb.sub_task, mb.work_start,mb.education_level, mb.work_type, mb.pay_date, b.subject,b.id,b.sno,b.board_delete, c.corp_logo, c.corp_name, m.profile_img FROM mansearch_board mb LEFT JOIN board b ON mb.sno = b.sno LEFT JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id LEFT JOIN corperation c ON m.id = c.id WHERE b.boardtype='mansearch' and b.subject LIKE '%${findStr}%' or mb.position LIKE '%${findStr}%' or mb.main_task LIKE '%${findStr}%' or mb.required_skill LIKE '%${findStr}%' or c.corp_name LIKE '%${findStr}%' ORDER BY b.sno desc limit ${startNo}, ${listSize}

SELECT DATEDIFF(deadline, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y-%m-%d')) as deadlinecount, mb.pay, mb.pay_date, mb.education_level, mb.work_type, mb.corp_location, mb.position, mb.required_career, mb.job_type, mb.required_skill, mb.deadline, mb.main_task, mb.sub_task,mb.work_start,mb.sno, mb.mansearch_sno, b.subject, b.doc, b.id, b.sno, c.corp_logo, c.corp_name, c.manager_name, c.manager_phone, c.manager_email, m.pixel FROM mansearch_board mb LEFT JOIN board b ON mb.sno = b.sno LEFT JOIN member m ON b.id = m.id LEFT JOIN corperation c ON m.id = c.id WHERE b.boardtype = 'mansearch' and mb.mansearch_sno = ${mansearch_sno}
SELECT pr.premium_review_sno,pr.mansearch_sno,pr.id AS writer_id,review FROM premium_review pr WHERE pr.premium_review_sno=${premium_review_sno}
select premium_review_sno from premium_review_buylist where id = #{id}
select corp_status from member where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into mansearch_board(sno,work_start,pay,corp_location,position,job_type,required_career,education_level,work_type,pay_date,required_skill,deadline,main_task,sub_task) values((select sno from board order by sno desc limit 0,1),#{work_start},#{pay},#{corp_location},#{position},#{job_type},#{required_career},#{education_level},#{work_type},#{pay_date},#{required_skill},#{deadline},#{main_task},#{sub_task})
mapper.update: update board set subject = #{subject}, doc = #{doc} where sno = #{sno}

update mansearch_board set work_start = #{work_start}, pay = #{pay}, corp_location = #{corp_location}, position = #{position}, job_type = #{job_type}, required_career = #{required_career}, education_level = #{education_level}, work_type = #{work_type}, pay_date = #{pay_date}, required_skill = #{required_skill}, deadline = #{deadline}, main_task = #{main_task}, sub_task = #{sub_task}
UPDATE board SET board_delete = 1 WHERE sno = ${sno}
update member set pixel = pixel-200 where id = #{id}
update member set pixel = pixel+200 where id = #{writer_id}
